title: Exploring Python's First-Class Objects Memory Model
description: In this lab, you will explore the concept of first-class objects and Python's memory model by generalizing functions for reading CSV data into a separate file.

meta.title: Mastering Python's First-class Objects | Memory Model
meta.description: Explore the power of having first-class objects and better understand Python's memory model with this comprehensive programming tutorial.
meta.keywords: Python, first-class objects, memory model, data processing, CSV, type conversion
